籤詩版本二:
Iriddii toori ee la xardhay ee dhagaxa hoosteeda ahayd ayuu isku tuuray si uu nin ugu celiyo.
Yaa heli kara haddii aad wakhti hore qorsheysato?, ma jiro qof adduunka dhex mara.
詩意:
Hexagramkani waxa uu ku tuurayaa sawirka shimbir naxaas ah oo dhagax ah.
Calaamad nasiib wanaag wax walba.
解曰: Kalluun la'aan cun. Inaad daahir noqoto oo aad faraxsan tahay waa sabool. Sug Tetra Pak. Awood iyo dad.
籤詩故事一:
◇Rabbiga wuxuu la kulmaa Rabbiga
Tang Dynasty, Xue Li (614-683), magaca sharafta leh ee Rengui, wuxuu ku dhashay Longmen, Jiangzhou (hadda Hejin, Shanxi).
Xue Rengui waxa uu ku biiray ciidanka saddex jeer, isaga oo u adeegaya kaliya sida askari cunto ah.
Markii Emperor Taizong (Li Shimin) ee Tang Dynasty uu eryanayay Gaisu, wuxuu galay khatar waxaana soo badbaadiyay Rengui.
Taasi waa, waxaa loo magacaabay Marshal by Emperor Taizong ee Tang Dynasty, oo u horseeday ciidamada bari, oo uu ku guuleystey faa'iidooyin ciidan oo badan.
聖意: Gurigu nafsadiisa uma roona, waa nimco, waa raxmad, waa raxmad, waa adag tahay in la helo nasiib, way adag tahay in la ganacsado, guurku waa iska caadi, Liujia waa nabad, dadku waxay u dhow yihiin beeraha, silkworms ayaa ku yaal. goor hore la beeray, lix neef oo xoolo ah baa la waayay, dad baa maqan, dacwad guudna waa xaq, tahriib baa khayr leh, hanti luntay, cudurro la helay, buurta nabadda loo diro.
